name: dbt-agent-marketplace
description: Skills for working with dbt Core and the dbt Fusion engine - analytics engineering, data modeling, semantic layer, and dbt platform (fka dbt Cloud) operations

plugins.name: dbt
plugins.description: Skills for analytics engineering with dbt — building models, writing tests, querying the semantic layer, troubleshooting jobs, and more.

plugins.name: dbt-migration
plugins.description: Skills for migrating dbt projects — moving from dbt Core to the Fusion engine or across data platforms.
